text: Wolfgang Becker (22 June 1954 – 12 December 2024) was a German movie director and screenwriter. He was best known for his work Good Bye Lenin! (2003). Daum, Andreas W., "Good Bye, Lenin! (2003): Coping with Change ‒ and the Future in the Counterfactual". Deutsche Filmgeschichten: Historische Porträts, ed. Nicolai Hannig et. al. Goettingen: Wallstein, 2023, 221‒276. Becker died in Berlin, Germany on 12 December 2024, at the age of 70. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:2024 deaths Category:German movie directors Category:German movie producers Category:German screenwriters Category:Writers from North Rhine-Westphalia
